content: elevate your crochet wardrobe with our shell crochet duster pattern perfect for all skill levels this duster is a must-have for any crocheter the pattern includes sizes xs to 6x with actual bust/hip measurements ranging from 44 to 72 the duster features a beautiful shell pattern that adds elegance and breathability to the design paired with solid sleeves in your choice of straight or tapered styles and a pair of patch pockets it s both fabulous and functional with clear written instructions crocheting this duster is a breeze **unique features-** sizes xs to 6x for a perfect fit elegant shell pattern adds texture easy-to-follow written instructions for all skill levels right and left-handed video tutorials included versatile design allows for customization **materials needed-** hook 8mm us size 11 0 yarn katia azteca https //www awin1 com/cread php awinmid=38316&awinaffid=1135855&ued=https%3a%2f%2fwww katia com%2fus%2fazteca-wool-acrylic-grey-yarn-7801 aran weight 1340-2450 yards
